name: Nuclear Countdown
description:
In this thrilling game, you must race against time to shut down the nuclear reactors before the space station explodes. With danger lurking around every corner, you'll need to use all of your skills and quick thinking to disable the reactors and save the day. Can you rise to the challenge and prevent disaster? Find out in Nuclear Countdown: Race Against The Reactors

Controls:

Move - WASD / Gamepad Left Thumbstick

Look - Mouse / Gamepad Right Thumbstick

Sprint - Shift / Gamepad Right Trigger (RT)

Shoot - Left Mouse Button / Gamepad Right Shoulder (RB)

Interact - E / Gamepad Left Shoulder (LB)

Pause - Esc / Right Special
